items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight REST API built with Node.js, Express and Sequelize for managing stock trades and lots. It lets you record buy/sell trades, automatically matches sells against existing lots using either FIFO or LIFO logic, and even bulk-loads batches of trades in a single transaction.
items.title: ShubLuci/tradelot-service: A lightweight REST API built with Node.js, Express and Sequelize for managing stock trades and lots. It lets you record buy/sell trades, automatically matches sells against existing lots using either FIFO or LIFO logic, and even bulk-loads batches of trades in a single transaction.

items.content_html: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
items.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: A Stopwatch is a time-tracking tool that allows users to start, stop, and reset time intervals. It is commonly used in sports, productivity tracking, and experiments. This stopwatch is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it lightweight, responsive, and easy to integrate into any web application.
items.title: sanketchoudhary5/Stop-Watch: A Stopwatch is a time-tracking tool that allows users to start, stop, and reset time intervals. It is commonly used in sports, productivity tracking, and experiments. This stopwatch is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it lightweight, responsive, and easy to integrate into any web application.

items.content_html: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
items.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

items.content_html: SharpTeX is a lightweight syntax system that converts to LaTeX, helping students format reports, theses, and other academic documents easily.
items.title: helitoo/SharpTeX: SharpTeX is a lightweight syntax system that converts to LaTeX, helping students format reports, theses, and other academic documents easily.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
